description: Given a text input, continue it with additional text.

completionConfig.label: gpt4
completionConfig.chatSystemMessage: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information.

output.result: there was a person who needed help finding information. They were unsure where to start, so they turned to me, their AI assistant. They asked me to help them find information on a variety of topics, from historical events to scientific theories. I was always ready to assist, providing them with accurate and relevant information in a timely manner. Whether they needed to know the weather forecast for their upcoming trip, the latest news updates, or detailed data for their research, I was there to help. And so, they were able to find the information they needed, all thanks to their trusty AI assistant.
